local_intent: Lift the grasped pot lid upward by 0.10 m while maintaining a stable grasp.
assumptions: Pot lid is already grasped by the gripper
There is clear vertical space above the pot lid for a 0.10 m lift
coherence_with_global: Implements the RaiseHeld pot_lid 0.10 step with pre/post grasp stability checks consistent with the GLOBAL_BT phase.
